This sss   website provides and introduction to the R workshops run by the Digital Skills Lab (DSL) at LSE. You can navigate this website using the top bar menu, where you can find information about:

-   Why R is a popular programming language and why you should learn it

-   How to install R and RStudio on to your own laptops


For support email the use at Digital.Skills.Lab\@lse.ac.uk.
